channel.title: Error: When starting my client. It gets an error? What do I do?
channel.description: The error it gets is: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1240) at client.method146(client.java:11784) at client.method102(client.java:7561) at client.method9(client.java:8456) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4252) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]

item.title: Error: When starting my client. It gets an error? What do I do?
item.dc:creator: @Defiance Defiance
item.description:
@Defiance wrote:

The error it gets is:

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1240) at client.method146(client.java:11784) at client.method102(client.java:7561) at client.method9(client.java:8456) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4252) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
